verses.text: At the going forth of Israel from Egypt, of the house of Jacob from a barbarous people,
Judea became his \f + \fr 113:2 \fl Or, \ft consecrated thing. \f* sanctuary, \add and\add* Israel his dominion.
The sea saw and fled: Jordan was turned back.
The mountains skipped like rams, and the hills like lambs.
What \add ailed\add* you, O sea, that you fled? and you Jordan, that you were turned back?
\add You⌃\add* mountains, that you⌃ skipped like rams, and \add you⌃\add* hills, like lambs?
The earth trembled at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;
who turned the rock into pools of water, and the \f + \fr 113:8 \fl Gr. \ft sharp rock. \f* flint into fountains of water.
